summary: This mod changes the default gold coin texture to have the Awesome Smiley on it. Gold coins are now awesome.
descriptionHtml:
~Awesome Gold Version 2.0

~This mod changes the default gold coin texture to have the Awesome Smiley on it. Gold coins are now awesome.


~Installation
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder) in your Skyrim folder
4. Start Skyrim, then go find some coins!


~Uninstallation
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod:

a. Data\\textures\\clutter\\coin01.dds
b. Data\\textures\\clutter\\coin01_n.dds

~Incompatibility
This mod should not have any incompatibility issues, other than any other mods that change the coin textures. If anything is found, then please tell me on the comments!


~Known Issues or Bugs
None known. If any are found, please tell me on the comments!


~Change Log
2.0- Makes the gold \"realistic\" by making the Awesome Smiley look like it is engraved on the coin. 
1.0- Original Release


~Credits
None.


~LoganZezima
author: LoganZezima
